body: I'm not convinced that destroying `input_batch` is a good idea in here. I'd rather see transforms as functional entities. Otherwise, this will need to be documented very well.
body_html: I'm not convinced that destroying input_batch is a good idea in here. I'd rather see transforms as functional entities. Otherwise, this will need to be documented very well.
